DocumentGetElementsByName.summary:
The getElementsByName() method
of the object returns a Collection of
elements with a given name attribute in the document.

remarks.para:
- to return a reference to an element by its
unique id
- to return references to elements with
the same tag name
- to return references to elements via CSS
selectors like 'div.myclass'

DocumentGetElementsByName.returns: A live collection, meaning it automatically updates as new elements with the same name are added to, or removed from, the document.
